patthana21.38:1.1: Nasahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.38:2.1: Naahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.38:3.1: (Nasahetukanaanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.38:4.1: Nasahetukaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.38:5.1: (Nahetusampayuttaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ sahetukadukasadisaṁ. Tīṇi pañhā. Hetusahetukaduke ca hetuhetusampayuttaduke ca pañhā no labbhati.)
